fields.original_string: private static final String ACCOUNT_USER_URL = ACCOUNT_URL + "/user";
private static final String ACCOUNT_APP_URL = ACCOUNT_URL + "/app";

methods.modifiers: @RequestMapping(value = "/", method = RequestMethod.GET) @ResponseBody @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ROLE_ADMIN') or hasRole('ROLE_DEVICE_MANAGER') or hasRole('ROLE_DRPROGRAM')") public
